text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
……I'm surprised. To think you wouldn't pass. 
With Trainer's skills, I thought it was a given that you'd pass.

I didn't think I would fail the Central Trainer License Exam…… 
But, there was a reason I failed.
I show Furioso a brief summary of the exam questions.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
『The different varieties of turf』. 
For Central Races, list the types of grass used, is it……?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
This is……outside your expertise. Funabashi……or rather, 
most local racetracks only have dirt courses, after all.

It wasn't that I wasn't aware. However, since I was 
dedicating everything to helping Furioso succeed, I 
hadn't studied anything that wasn't relevant to her future.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
There are so many technical questions…… Now that I think 
about it, I'd heard that the Central Trainer Exam was 
extremely tough for trainers who were transferring.
choice_data_list: To think it was like this……
To think it was like this……

text_block_list.text:
This time, there were several other people who took 
the exam with me…… Only a few passed each time.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
What should we do……? Without a license, 
then Trainer won't be able to enter Tracen Academy……

At this point, there was only one thing we could do. 
But, it will probably be troublesome for Furioso……
choice_data_list: For now……could you wait for me?
For now……could you wait for me?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Eh, wait for you……!?
choice_data_list: I'll pass the next exam for sure!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: The next exam……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
……I understand. For now, I'll focus on self training. 
We'll make up for the time we've lost once we're together.

So for now, the two of us decided to work independently. 
One of us at Tracen Academy and the other at Funabashi.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(Ugh……I don't know any of the Uma Musume around me…… 
Most likely, they're all elites……)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(But as a representative of Funabashi……I won't lose. 
Everyone around me——is an enemy)

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hey hey, you're Funabashi's Furioso-san, right? 
I'm Smart Falcon!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I know it's kind of sudden but, 
would you take one of these tickets?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Ha? Ticket? 
For what……?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
A ticket for the Idol Live I'm holding next time. 
And if you could, at the venue～

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
L・O・V・E! V, V, Falco♪ 
Could you do that!?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(……Huh? What is this? 
Is this some kind of prank in Central?)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(I don't get it…… Is she messing with me? 
Does she have some ulterior motive……?)

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Hey. You, you're the one that came alone 
from Funabashi? Tch……always on your own.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Why don't you show me what you've got? 
We're gonna do some parallel running, got it!?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(Eh, this……is she perhaps worried since 
I'm training by myself? ……Haa, no way!)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: ——I won't join you.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I won't join you. I'm just a transfer 
student after all. ……Well then.

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text: What was that? Don't just ignore us!

text_block_list.name: Falcon & Espoir
text_block_list.text:
Furioso-san♪ 
Yo, Furioso!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Ah, yeah……! 
Wait, no……ugh……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(They keep……getting closer and closer…… Central is the enemy. 
But, after talking to everyone, I know they're all good girls……)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(At this rate, I'll end up joining them…… If I talk to them…… 
I'll end up becoming friends! So that I don't become a traitor……)

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I won't……join you! 
I'm not someone that would join you!!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, once Trainer is here then……! 
I'll be able to catch up on all that training in one go!

I spent the days immersed in intense studying. Now that I understood 
the trends in the questions, I won't make the same mistake again.
choice_data_list: I'll pass for sure, next time!

text_block_list.text:
Tomorrow is the day I take the exam again. 
I can't let Furioso do this on her own for so long.

And so——the announcement of the results 
of my second attempt at the License Exam.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Trai……ner…… 
Trai—……

The results were……a nightmare. For a while, neither 
of us could say a word. The only thing we could hear 
was the dripping of the faucet in the kitchen.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
So that's what happened…… The contents of the 
questions were completely different from before.

I was stunned when I saw the test paper. As 
expected of the Central Exams. My preparations 
based on the previous exam were perfect, but……

At this rate, there was no telling when I'd be able 
to pass. Her training was already being delayed, and 
our goal of beating Central was in question.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
We'll just have……to wait for next time. 
Honestly, it's been hard working alone. But……

I couldn't help but feel regret and guilt. 
But the thing that was more important than those feelings——

We couldn't keep wasting time. Bringing out Furioso's 
talent……could be done by another trainer in Central.

Then——there was one thing I could do. 
For someone like me, there was only one thing I could do——

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Eh, Trainer, by stop here……?
choice_data_list: I won't take the next exam

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
——!? 
Trai……ner……
The dripping of the faucet seemed louder.
